# nirvana Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "nirvana" {
  auth_token = "My Auth Token"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `auth_token` (String)

### Optional

- `base_url` (String) Set the base url that the provider connects to. This can be used for testing in other environments.
